schemes.name: National Horticulture Mission (NHM) – Karnataka Implementation
schemes.department: Department of Horticulture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Supports expansion of horticulture crops, nursery development, area expansion and input assistance.
schemes.benefits: Subsidy support for planting material, area expansion and horticulture inputs.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers cultivating horticulture crops in Karnataka; subsidy varies by crop and activity.

schemes.name: Micro Irrigation for Horticulture Crops (PMKSY – Horticulture)
schemes.department: Department of Horticulture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides subsidy for installation of drip and sprinkler irrigation systems in horticulture.
schemes.benefits: Improved water efficiency and higher crop productivity.
schemes.eligibility: All farmers growing notified horticulture crops.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Horticulture Department or online portal.

schemes.name: Protected Cultivation / Polyhouse Subsidy Scheme
schemes.department: Department of Horticulture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides subsidy for polyhouse and shade net cultivation of high-value crops.
schemes.benefits: Higher yields, quality produce and protected growing conditions.
schemes.eligibility: Registered farmers cultivating high-value horticulture crops.

schemes.name: Post-Harvest Management Subsidy (Cold Storage & Warehousing Support)
schemes.department: Department of Horticulture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides assistance for construction of cold storage and post-harvest infrastructure.
schemes.benefits: Reduced post-harvest losses and improved storage life.
schemes.eligibility: Individuals, farmer groups and FPOs engaged in horticulture handling.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Horticulture Department or District Office.

schemes.name: Grading, Packing & Primary Processing Support for Horticulture Produce
schemes.department: Department of Horticulture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Supports development of grading, sorting, packaging and primary processing units.
schemes.benefits: Improved market value and reduced wastage.
schemes.eligibility: Eligible farmers, SHGs, cooperatives and FPOs.

schemes.name: Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture (MIDH) – Post-Harvest Components
schemes.description: Financial assistance for cold chain, pack houses, ripening chambers and storage units.
schemes.benefits: Improved shelf life and value addition for horticulture produce.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers, FPOs, cooperatives, entrepreneurs and agri startups.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through State Horticulture Mission or Department offices.

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Formalisation of Micro Food Processing Enterprises (PMFME)
schemes.description: Provides credit-linked subsidy and financial assistance to micro food processing enterprises.
schemes.benefits: Capital subsidy, branding and market support.
schemes.eligibility: Individual entrepreneurs, SHGs, FPOs and cooperatives.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through PMFME online portal or State Nodal Agency.

schemes.name: Cold Chain, Value Addition and Preservation Infrastructure Scheme
schemes.description: Supports creation of cold chain infrastructure including pack houses, transport and cold storage.
schemes.benefits: Reduced spoilage and improved supply chain efficiency.
schemes.eligibility: Food processing units, FPOs, private enterprises and cooperatives.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Ministry of Food Processing Industries portal.
